  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project import quaternion_ops

class TestQuaternionOps(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_quaternion_conjugate(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        q_conj = quaternion_ops.quaternion_conjugate(q)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(q_conj, np.array([1, -2, -3, -4])))

    def test_quaternion_magnitude(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 2, 3])
        magnitude = quaternion_ops.quaternion_magnitude(q)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(magnitude, 4.0)

    def test_quaternion_normalize(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 2, 3])
        q_norm = quaternion_ops.quaternion_normalize(q)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(q_norm, np.array([0.25, 0.5, 0.5, 0.75])))

    def test_quaternion_normalize_zero_magnitude(self):
        q = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0])
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_normalize(q)

    def test_quaternion_multiply(self):
        q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
        q_mult = quaternion_ops.quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
        expected = np.array([-60, 12, 30, 24])
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(q_mult, expected))

    def test_quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(self):
        # Test with a simple quaternion representing a 180-degree rotation around the x-axis
        q = np.array([0, 1, 0, 0])
        rot_matrix = quaternion_ops.quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q)
        expected_matrix = np.array([[1, 0, 0],
                                    [0, -1, 0],
                                    [0, 0, -1]])
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(rot_matrix, expected_matrix))

    def test_quaternion_to_rotation_matrix_identity(self):
        # Test with the identity quaternion
        q = np.array([1, 0, 0, 0])
        rot_matrix = quaternion_ops.quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q)
        expected_matrix = np.eye(3)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(rot_matrix, expected_matrix))

    def test_invalid_quaternion_length(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3])
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_conjugate(q)
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_magnitude(q)
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_normalize(q)
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_multiply(q, np.array([1,2,3,4]))
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_multiply(np.array([1,2,3,4]), q)
        with self.assertRaises(ValueError):
            quaternion_ops.quaternion_to_rotation_matrix(q)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  }
]
